item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (203 points | 41 comments)
2. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (290 points | 66 comments)
3. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (26 points | 1 comment)
4. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (247 points | 55 comments)
5. Show HN: Rust based AWS Lambda Logs Viewer (TUI) (11 points | 3 comments)
6. Vapi (YC W21) is hiring a founding infra engineer to handle scale ( | hide)
7. Why Safety Profiles Failed (99 points | 56 comments)
8. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (155 points | 48 comments)
9. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (197 points | 55 comments)
10. Never Missing the Train Again (186 points | 62 comments)
11. Show HN: 2048 turned 10 this year, I built an updated version to celebrate (485 points | 167 comments)
12. Post World War II Food (169 points | 131 comments)
13. Brush – A new compatible Gaussian splatting engine (99 points | 25 comments)
14. When Samsung meets MediaTek: the story of a small bug chain [pdf] (23 points | 2 comments)
15. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (63 points | 19 comments)
16. Species in Pieces (30 points | 4 comments)
17. U.S. Consumer Watchdog Cautions Businesses on Surveillance of Workers (63 points | 12 comments)
18. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (73 points | 31 comments)
19. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (20 points | 4 comments)
20. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (109 points | 38 comments)
21. Show HN: Pneumatic – free open-source workflow software (22 points | 3 comments)
22. Rsbuild – A Better Vite? (13 points | 5 comments)
23. Quit Social Media (2016) (50 points | 50 comments)
24. The Anvil Text Editor (91 points | 68 comments)
25. Data viz project that maps all earthquakes by magnitude (57 points | 10 comments)
26. Boeing 787s must be reset every 51 days or 'misleading data' is shown (2020) (110 points | 110 comments)
27. Rider is now free for non-commercial use (671 points | 325 comments)
28. Riot Games: Peeking into Valorant's Netcode (2020) (137 points | 56 comments)
29. Self-Documenting Code (54 points | 97 comments)
30. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (442 points | 135 comments)
